post.body: Man this ZeroNet thing is fuckin' awesome! Love everything about it, the UI, Speed, thugness, security and etc.

Everyone! Just made a tiny music pirating site, feel free to
check it out. currently I'm trying to get a .bit domain for it so
i would be very thankful if anyone could help me to get one :)
Suggestions, recommendations and ideas are appreciated! :D
